content.content: You can apply for a higher arranged overdraft limit above the interest-free arranged overdraft buffer. A preferential arranged overdraft interest rate is available for our ufirst Private customers.

If your arranged overdraft balance exceeds the interest free arranged overdraft buffer on your account, then the entire arranged overdraft balance will be charged at the preferential arranged overdraft interest rate.

Overdrafts are repayable on demand. Your debit balance should not exceed your arranged overdraft limit. If your account overruns without formally agreeing an arranged overdraft, or you exceed your arranged overdraft limit, this is called an Unarranged Overdraft. When this happens, you will incur Unarranged Overdraft interest as well as the Maintenance Charge. You may also have to pay the Paid Referral Fee and the Guaranteed Card Payment Fee. For full details of the interest and charges please see our - [Guide to Personal Account Fees and Interest brochure](http://www.ulsterbank.co.uk/documents/ni/Guide_to_Personal_Account_Fees_Interest.pdf). Please contact the Private Banking Support team for details.

Lending criteria, terms and conditions apply. Credit facilities are available to over 18s only. Please refer to our booklet [A Guide to Personal Account Fees and Interest brochure](http://www.ulsterbank.co.uk/documents/ni/Guide_to_Personal_Account_Fees_Interest.pdf) for more details.

content.title: A guide to personal accounts fees and interest

content.content: Don't have Acrobat Reader? [Download it for free at Adobe](http://get.adobe.com/uk/reader/)

metaData.heading: Want to apply for a preferential arranged overdraft interest rate?

content.content: To apply for a preferential arranged overdraft interest rate, please contact your Relationship Manager.

metaData.heading: Here's what other people are asking

content.heading: Have you additional packaged accounts with Ulster Bank?

content.content: If you already hold a packaged account from Ulster Bank and are satisfied to open an additional packaged account, you may not be entitled to any extra benefits by holding multiple accounts. You will also be charged an additional monthly account fee on the new packaged account.

content.heading: Are you living outside Northern Ireland or the rest of the UK?

content.content: If you are living outside Northern Ireland or the rest of the UK or plan on living outside Northern Ireland or the rest of the UK, it is important to note that some of the benefits attached to your account are only available when you are visiting Northern Ireland or the rest of the UK or when you are resident in Northern Ireland or the rest of the UK. For further information please call ufirst Private Membership Services on *[0345 607 2538](03456072538)* or from outside the UK call *[00 44 2392 676 573](00442392676573)*.

content.heading: What happens if I close or downgrade my account?

content.content: If you close or downgrade your ufirst Private account you will no longer be entitled to the benefits.
